name: The gifts
description:
6 short stories about 6 small gifts.

"There will be a disturbing lack of blood."

The gifts is a short twine game using text, animation and art in order to tell several short horror stories which are linked by the theme "bloodless."

This project was created during the month of October, however not published until early November because I was busy working in a haunted house... ironic.

You need not replay to get different endings, you will see every story in any playthrough.

Thank you for playing, please consider leaving a rating or comment!

Happy belated Halloween
